txt.en: Avordur is in Dol Amroth, far to the south of the Paths of the Dead.\n\nAvordur will be pleased to begin working on the Blooms of Decay you recovered.
Gather Blooms of Decay from Kêr Bras ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Blooms of Decay grow within Kêr Bras.
Gathered Blooms of Decay from Kêr Bras ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'It will take many weeks to properly treat these, but once they are, they will be a great boon to us.'

'There is a type of mushroom, the Bloom of Decay, that is very potent and powerful. Its primary use is to make poisons, very virulent concoctions that can kill a man within minutes. However, few know of its other, more valuable use. With the right treatment, patience, and time, it can cure a myriad of poisons and diseases.\n\n'Blooms of Decay grow at Kêr Bras, within the Paths of the Dead, far to the north of here. Bring me back several and I will begin the lengthy process.'
Blooms of Decay can be found at Kêr Bras, inside the Paths of the Dead, far to the north of Dol Amroth.\n\nAvordur asked you to gather several Blooms of Decay from Kêr Bras.
